official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "National STD Awareness Month".

summary.text: Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National STD Awareness Month. Recognizes the human toll of sexually transmitted infections and the importance of making the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of such infections an urgent public health priority. Urges all sexually active individuals to get tested for such infections and seek appropriate care.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of "National STD Awareness Month".
